parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Local protection
parameter.description: Enables/disables local entry. If activated module stops responding to S1 and S2 push buttons, SCENE ID and association commands will not be sent. Only exception is the B-button.

options.option: No protection. Roller Shutter responds to push buttons
Local protection active. Roller Shutter does not respond to push butto

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Radio protection
parameter.description: Enables/disables RF protection. If activated device stops responding to command frames. Configuration and polling still possible.

options.option: No protection. Roller Shutter responds to command frames.
RF Protection active. Roller Shutter does not respond to the Z-Wave co

options.option: Blind position reports sent to the main controller using Z-Wave Comman
Blind position reports sent to the main controller using Fibar Command

parameter.label: 22: Motor operation time

parameter.name: config_40_1
parameter.label: 40: Power reports
parameter.description: Power level change that will result in new power value report being sent. value is a percentage of the previous report.

parameter.name: config_42_2
parameter.label: 42: Periodic power or energy reports
parameter.description: Time to the next report. Value of 0 means the reports are turned off.

parameter.name: config_43_1
parameter.label: 43: Energy reports
parameter.description: Energy level change which will result in new energy value report being sent. Value of 0 means the reports are turned off.

parameter.name: config_44_1
parameter.label: 44: Self-measurement
parameter.description: Enables/disables to include the power and energy used by itself in reports to main controller.

parameter.label: 50: Scenes/ Associations activation
parameter.description: Parameter determines whether scenes or associations are activated by the switch keys.
